title: Error when importing miou_utils
body:
Hi,

I am trying to run the train.py script but it throws an error on the line saying that miou_utils does not exist
```
from miou_utils import compute_iu, fast_cm
```
I tried to add a couple of lines before that one:
```
import pyximport
pyximport.install()
from miou_utils import compute_iu, fast_cm
```
Now it does not throw the above error but it gives another error:

> File "/home/projects/mrey/anaconda3/envs/python36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pyximport/pyximport.py", line 215, in load_module
    inplace=build_inplace, language_level=language_level)
  File "/home/projects/mrey/anaconda3/envs/python36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pyximport/pyximport.py", line 191, in build_module
    reload_support=pyxargs.reload_support)
  File "/home/projects/mrey/anaconda3/envs/python36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pyximport/pyxbuild.py", line 102, in pyx_to_dll
    dist.run_commands()
  File "/home/projects/mrey/anaconda3/envs/python36/lib/python3.6/distutils/dist.py", line 955, in run_commands
    self.run_command(cmd)
  File "/home/projects/mrey/anaconda3/envs/python36/lib/python3.6/distutils/dist.py", line 974, in run_command
    cmd_obj.run()
  File "/home/projects/mrey/anaconda3/envs/python36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Distutils/old_build_ext.py", line 186, in run
    _build_ext.build_ext.run(self)
  File "/home/projects/mrey/anaconda3/envs/python36/lib/python3.6/distutils/command/build_ext.py", line 339, in run
    self.build_extensions()
  File "/home/projects/mrey/anaconda3/envs/python36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Distutils/old_build_ext.py", line 195, in build_extensions
    _build_ext.build_ext.build_extensions(self)
  File "/home/projects/mrey/anaconda3/envs/python36/lib/python3.6/distutils/command/build_ext.py", line 448, in build_extensions
    self._build_extensions_serial()
  File "/home/projects/mrey/anaconda3/envs/python36/lib/python3.6/distutils/command/build_ext.py", line 473, in _build_extensions_serial
    self.build_extension(ext)
  File "/home/projects/mrey/anaconda3/envs/python36/lib/python3.6/distutils/command/build_ext.py", line 533, in build_extension
    depends=ext.depends)
  File "/home/projects/mrey/anaconda3/envs/python36/lib/python3.6/distutils/ccompiler.py", line 574, in compile
    self._compile(obj, src, ext, cc_args, extra_postargs, pp_opts)
  File "/home/projects/mrey/anaconda3/envs/python36/lib/python3.6/distutils/unixccompiler.py", line 118, in _compile
    extra_postargs)
  File "/home/projects/mrey/anaconda3/envs/python36/lib/python3.6/distutils/ccompiler.py", line 909, in spawn
    spawn(cmd, dry_run=self.dry_run)
  File "/home/projects/mrey/anaconda3/envs/python36/lib/python3.6/distutils/spawn.py", line 36, in spawn
    _spawn_posix(cmd, search_path, dry_run=dry_run)
  File "/home/projects/mrey/anaconda3/envs/python36/lib/python3.6/distutils/spawn.py", line 119, in _spawn_posix
    exec_fn(executable, cmd)
  File "/home/projects/mrey/.pycharm_helpers/pydev/_pydev_bundle/pydev_monkey.py", line 423, in new_execv
    return getattr(os, original_name)(patch_path(path), patch_args(args))
  File "/home/projects/mrey/anaconda3/envs/python36/lib/python3.6/os.py", line 559, in execvp
    _execvpe(file, args)
  File "/home/projects/mrey/anaconda3/envs/python36/lib/python3.6/os.py", line 594, in _execvpe
    exec_func(fullname, *argrest)
  File "/home/projects/mrey/.pycharm_helpers/pydev/_pydev_bundle/pydev_monkey.py", line 423, in new_execv
    return getattr(os, original_name)(patch_path(path), patch_args(args))
  File "/home/projects/mrey/.pycharm_helpers/pydev/_pydev_bundle/pydev_monkey.py", line 367, in patch_path
    return sys.executable if is_python(path) else path
  File "/home/projects/mrey/.pycharm_helpers/pydev/_pydev_bundle/pydev_monkey.py", line 100, in is_python
    if path.endswith("'") or path.endswith('"'):
TypeError: endswith first arg must be bytes or a tuple of bytes, not str

Do you know how to fix this?
